# Python dependencies for CI/CD helper scripts
# Install: pip install -r .github/scripts/ci/requirements.txt

# YAML parsing (for SERVICE.MD and workflow files)
pyyaml>=6.0.1

# Template rendering (for job summaries)
jinja2>=3.1.2

# GitHub API (for creating issues, PR comments)
PyGithub>=2.1.1

# HTTP requests (for API calls)
requests>=2.31.0

# Data processing
pandas>=2.0.0

# JSON schema validation
jsonschema>=4.20.0
